); const MessagePage = () => { const [selectedContact, setSelectedContact] = useState(null); const contacts = [ { type: 'human', name: 'Dr. Maria Gonzales', avatar: '/api/placeholder/100/100', lastMessage: "I'll review your latest test results.", time: '12:30 PM', online: true, unread: 2 }, { type: 'ai', name: 'Health Assistant AI', lastMessage: 'Your vital signs are within normal range.', time: '11:15 AM', online: true, unread: 0 }, { type: 'human', name: 'Nurse Sarah Johnson', avatar: '/api/placeholder/100/100', lastMessage: 'Your next check-up is scheduled.', time: '10:45 AM', online: true, unread: 1 } ]; useEffect(() => { if (!selectedContact && contacts.length > 0) { setSelectedContact(contacts[0]); } }, []); return (
